import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Card, CardBody, CardFooter, CardTitle, Col, Progress, Row, FormGroup, Label, Input, } from 'reactstrap'; import { Line } from 'react-chartjs-2'; let myAccount = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('account') || '{}'); const data = { labels: ['January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July'], datasets: [ { label: 'My First dataset1', fill: false, lineTension: 0.1, backgroundColor: '#4dbd74 ', borderColor: '#4dbd74 ', borderCapStyle: 'butt', borderDash: [], borderDashOffset: 0.0, borderJoinStyle: 'miter', pointBorderColor: '#4dbd74 ', pointBackgroundColor: '#fff', pointBorderWidth: 1, pointHoverRadius: 5, pointHoverBackgroundColor: '#4dbd74 ', pointHoverBorderColor: '#4dbd74 ', pointHoverBorderWidth: 2, pointRadius: 1, pointHitRadius: 10, data: [65, 59, 80, 81, 56, 55, 40] }, { label: 'My First dataset2', fill: false, lineTension: 0.1, backgroundColor: '#FF3030', borderColor: '#FF3030', borderCapStyle: 'butt', borderDash: [], borderDashOffset: 0.0, borderJoinStyle: 'miter', pointBorderColor: '#FF3030', pointBackgroundColor: '#fff', pointBorderWidth: 1, pointHoverRadius: 5, pointHoverBackgroundColor: '#FF3030', pointHoverBorderColor: '#FF3030', pointHoverBorderWidth: 2, pointRadius: 1, pointHitRadius: 10, data: [75, 29, 30, 41, 56, 65, 20] } ] }; export default ({ account, historyMatchs, t1, t2, t3, t4 }) => { myAccount = account.find(e => e.username === myAccount.username) const [name, setName] = useState(myAccount.ingame); const matchsForName = [...historyMatchs].filter(i => i.blueTeam.some(e => {return e.search(e.ingame) !== -1 }) || i.red.some(e => {return e.search(e.ingame) !== -1 })) console.log(name, historyMatchs, matchsForName) return Match history chart
Persol Gaming 2020
 setName(e.target.value)}> { account.map(acc => { return }) }
